change_reason: Initial weight configuration per architecture spec
description: Health score weights and scoring tables for LinkedIn profile health calculation

ORANGE.description: Account at risk, hydration and light engagement only

RED.description: Account compromised or severely at risk, stop all activity immediately

account_age.description: Score based on account age in days

connection_count.description: Score based on total connection count

daily_application_count.description: Score based on applications submitted today (inverse: more apps = lower score)

days_since_last_restriction.description: Score based on how long since last restriction/warning

activity_diversity_score.description: Score based on variety of activities (applications, connections, reactions, views, etc)

session_pattern_regularity_score.description: Score based on how human-like the session patterns are

connection_request_acceptance_rate.description: Score based on what % of sent connection requests are accepted

state_transitions.green_to_yellow: Score drops below 85 or daily app count reaches 4+
state_transitions.yellow_to_orange: Score drops below 60 or LinkedIn warning banner appears
state_transitions.orange_to_red: Score drops below 30 or account restricted
state_transitions.any_to_red_immediate: Trust & Safety alert, verification request, or hard restriction
